message: You can stay at the Spring Lodge, there's plenty of room.
I'd offer our space, but we're going to be cramped as it is...hope you find a spot.
Is anyone looking to split or share a hotel room? A friend and I are looking for a hotel room.
One tip though: airbnb.com. We couldn't find any hotels, but airbnb came through for us.

Hey Eric - I was in the same boat, booking at the last minute. I ended up finding a house swap, which will hopefully work out beautifully... the girl I'm swapping with will be taking my place in NYC while I'm in Austin, so there's some risk, but amazingly enough, it's going to be free! My advice: book a hotel for next year now.
If you find one, I'd be interested, at least for 10th-16th.
